Name: Gargoyle
Description: A living statue with stone wings and sharp claws.

Name: Phantom
Description: A more refined humanoid ghost that wears a mask.

Name: Banshee
Description: A ragged hag-like ghost that screams.

Name: Succubus
Description: A beautiful woman with demonic wings and horns.

Name: Lich
Description: A vaguely humainoid spectre animated by otherworldly magic.

Name: Stal Spellsword
Description: A skeleton with a magic sword.

Name: Kobold
Description: A small humanoid with dog-like features.

Name: Hellhound
Description: A black  matted dog that breathes fire.

Name: Dormach
Description: A black dog that melds with shadows.

Name: Dryad
Description: A nymph that lives in trees.

Name: Naiad
Description: A nymph that lives in water.

Name: Nyctaena
Description: A nymph that lives in sand.

Name: Pleiades
Description: A nymph that comes from the night sky.

Name: Gorgon
Description: A snake lady with snakes for hair.

Name: Giant Spider
Description: A big spider. Some may even call it  "Giant".

Name: Giant Scorpion
Description: A big scorpion. Possibly even bigger than the spider.

Name: Black Widow
Description: A big spider with a venomous bite.

Name: Deathstalker
Description: A big scorpion with a venomous sting.

Name: Chimera
Description: A lion  goat  and snake combined.

Name: Cockatrice
Description: A chicken with a snake tail.

Name: Manticore
Description: A lion with a scorpion tail.

Name: Sphynx
Description: A lion with a human face and wings.

Name: Ninetails
Description: A fox with entirely too many tails.

Name: Nekomata
Description: A cat that's also a person.

Name: Scylla
Description: A lady with tentacles and dog heads coming from her hips.

Name: Beholder
Description: A floating eyeball with tentacles for reasons.

Name: Air Kraken
Description: See previous  but with stupid little wings.
